trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_SEQ_00<tab>As ever, Mumukko seeks a pair of idle hands to carry out her bidding.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_TODO_00<tab>Speak with crew members wearing new equipment.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Mumukko.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_001<tab>I know I needn't ask, but have you some time on your hands, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A1_000_001<tab>I know I needn't answer, but indeed I do!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A1_000_002<tab>Hm, then perhaps I needn't answer...
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_003<tab>Then we have an unspoken understanding!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_004<tab>Oh, don't play coy! You do, don't you?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A2_000_001<tab>Okay, you win.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A2_000_002<tab>What if I truly didn't? Wouldn't you feel awful?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_005<tab>I always do.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_006<tab>Well played, but I won't be fooled. If you <var 1A 02 /var>truly<var 1A 01 /var> had better things to do, you wouldn't be standing here!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_007<tab>We've recently begun distributing two new types of equipment to contributors. Thus far, reception seems positive.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_008<tab>As they were costly to develop, however, I must determine whether this has been a worthwhile investment of time and resources.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_009<tab>All the more so given that I was the one who approved the proposal to begin with. 'Tis a poor manager who scrutinizes everything but her own judgment.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_010<tab>Thus, I should like you to survey the individuals making use of our cutting-edge gear. To ensure candid responses, you understand.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_012<tab>I'm sure you'll find no few fitting subjects right here at Terra Firma!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_013<tab>If you see anyone wearing a shiny new suit, kindly ask for their thoughts. There's no more to the assignment than that.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452A_000_020<tab>Why, my new powersuit is an absolute delight! In my opinion, strength augmentation is its most useful feature.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452A_000_021<tab>In this garb, even a bookworm bereft of biceps can lift heavy cargo with ease─and I daresay we Sharlayans could do with the help. Ha!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452A_000_022<tab>It has a diverse range of other functions, too─each implemented based on input from the entire crew.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452A_000_023<tab>I am certain other early adopters have found their suits a boon as well. How fortunate that the initiative chose to invest in them!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452B_000_024<tab>My opinion on the powersuit? I suppose the feedback stage <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a vital part of development... Let me think.

TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452B_000_025<tab>Well, the helm's pretty great. Roomy enough for my ears to fit comfortably, and the filter supplies clean, breathable air in even the most toxic environments.

TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452B_000_026<tab>The best part, though? If your task calls for a lighter touch, you can wear it <var 1A 02 /var>without<var 1A 01 /var> the suit! If that's not innovation, I don't know what is!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_POWERSUIT05452B_000_027<tab>I'll bet Mumukko sent you, didn't she? Well, you can tell her we all <var 1A 02 /var>love<var 1A 01 /var> the powersuit!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_SHOOTINGWAY_000_028<tab>Fabulous! Hold that pose, please!

TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_COSMOGENERAL05452_000_029<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... 'Tis I, the Dark Vizier! Challenge me if you dare, my child, but know this: you underestimate the power of...<var 1A 02 /var>the Darkness.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_COSMOGENERAL05452_000_030<tab>In this garb, I wield the power of the galaxy itself. Its magnificence is beyond question. Mwahahaha!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_COSMOGENERAL05452_000_031<tab>My helm is the crown of our Cosmic Empire! Through a veil of crimson, I see the force of the aether spilling from every last star!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_SHOOTINGWAY_000_032<tab>Sorry, darling─he's rather immersed in his role at the moment. This attire attracts a subset of...passionate proponents, you see!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_SHOOTINGWAY_000_033<tab>(He told me he likes to blow off steam after work by pretending he's an evil space overlord... Erm, is everything all right back on Etheirys...?)
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_COSMOGENERAL05452_000_034<tab>Shkohhh...! The corruption of Oizys feeds my power!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_SHOOTINGWAY_000_035<tab>The camera loves you, darling! Give me fierce!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_040<tab>I take it you found enough participants for a representative sample, then.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_041<tab>First, I'd like to hear the feedback you received from the powersuit users. Suggestions? Complaints?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A3_000_001<tab>The strength augmentation has been well received.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A3_000_002<tab>People are raving about the helm's versatility.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A3_000_003<tab>They fit well! Particularly around the ears.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_043<tab>Sounds like a worthy investment to me! I'll arrange for mass production at once.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_044<tab>And the star admiral attire? Is it too ostentatious?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A4_000_001<tab>Its glory fills the wearer with galactic power!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A4_000_002<tab>It inspires...enthusiasm, shall we say.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_A4_000_003<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_046<tab>I...see? Well, if it improves morale, I'll allow it.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_047<tab>Don't tell me it's bewitched you, too... Rest assured I won't dare to cancel production, lest the enthusiasts come for me!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_048<tab>I'm told the costume originates from an opera with a dedicated following in Labyrinthos─an interstellar epic whose author is as yet unknown.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_049<tab>I was skeptical of its proposed value to the initiative, but it was so highly requested by ardent advocates that we had no choice but to concede.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_050<tab>Perhaps I ought to try it on myself, that I might better understand its appeal... One moment.
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_COMMANDINGWAY_000_051<tab>Mumukko!? What in Mother's name are ye wearin', lass!?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_PHASINGWAY_000_052<tab>How to put this... You wear it so well, it makes me feel...unsettled? Afraid?
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_COMMANDINGWAY_000_053<tab>She's frightenin' enough in her usual getup! Take it off, I beg of ye!
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_054<tab>Oh ho ho...
TEXT_KINGWZ303_05452_MUMUKKO_000_055<tab>They may claim to have no time for Mumukko, but none dare defy the <var 1A 02 /var>Cosmic Executive<var 1A 01 /var>!
